message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60, you get 40. We can negotiate later if you want to.
I'll match your starting offer, but I think I deserve a bit more. Your turn to think about it!
Okay, I'll give you 5 more dollars, but that's my final offer. If you don't accept, we'll keep going and the money will continue to decrease for both of us!
I'll take a slightly bigger share this time. I think I'm getting closer to a fair deal!
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 52 for me, 48 for you. This way, we both get a reasonable share, and we avoid losing even more money with each round.
